0;\n padding: 0;\n box-sizing: border-box;\n}\n\n:root {\n --primary-color: #6366f1;\n --secondary-color: #8b5cf6;\n --accent-color: #ec4899;\n --dark-bg: #0f172a;\n --darker-bg: #020617;\n --light-bg: #1e293b;\n --text-primary: #f1f5f9;\n --text-secondary: #94a3b8;\n --border-color: #334155;\n --success-color: #10b981;\n --gradient-1: linear-gradient(135deg, #6366f1 0%, #8b5cf6 100%);\n --gradient-2: linear-gradient(135deg, #ec4899 0%, #f43f5e 100%);\n --card-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);\n --card-shadow-hover: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);\n}\n\nhtml {\n scroll-behavior: smooth;\n}\n\nbody {\n font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;\n background-color: var(--dark-bg);\n color: var(--text-primary);\n line-height: 1.6;\n overflow-x: hidden;\n}\n\n.container {\n max-width: 1200px;\n margin: 0 auto;\n padding: 0 2rem;\n}\n\n/* Navigation */\n.navbar {\n position: fixed;\n top: 0;\n left: 0;\n right: 0;\n background-color: rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.95);\n backdrop-filter: blur(10px);\n z-index: 1000;\n border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);\n transition: all 0.3s ease;\n}\n\n.navbar .container {\n display: flex;\n justify-content: space-between;\n align-items: center;\n padding: 1rem 2rem;\n}\n\n.nav-brand a {\n font-size: 1.5rem;\n font-weight: bold;\n background: var(--gradient-1);\n -webkit-background-clip: text;\n -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;\n background-clip: text;\n text-decoration: none;\n}\n\n.nav-menu {\n display: flex;\n list-style: none;\n gap: 2rem;\n}\n\n.nav-link {\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n text-decoration: none;\n font-weight: 500;\n transition: color 0.3s ease;\n position: relative;\n}\n\n.nav-link::after {\n content: '';\n position: absolute;\n bottom: -5px;\n left: 0;\n width: 0;\n height: 2px;\n background: var(--gradient-1);\n transition: width 0.3s ease;\n}\n\n.nav-link:hover {\n color: var(--text-primary);\n}\n\n.nav-link:hover::after {\n width: 100%;\n}\n\n.nav-toggle {\n display: none;\n flex-direction: column;\n background: none;\n border: none;\n cursor: pointer;\n padding: 0.5rem;\n}\n\n.nav-toggle span {\n width: 25px;\n height: 3px;\n background-color: var(--text-primary);\n margin: 3px 0;\n transition: all 0.3s ease;\n border-radius: 3px;\n}\n\n/* Hero Section */\n.hero {\n min-height: 100vh;\n display: flex;\n align-items: center;\n justify-content: center;\n padding: 8rem 0 4rem;\n position: relative;\n background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--darker-bg) 0%, var(--dark-bg) 100%);\n}\n\n.hero::before {\n content: '';\n position: absolute;\n top: 0;\n left: 0;\n right: 0;\n bottom: 0;\n background: radial-gradient(circle at 20% 50%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),\n radial-gradient(circle at 80% 80%, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);\n pointer-events: none;\n}\n\n.hero-content {\n display: grid;\n grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;\n gap: 4rem;\n align-items: center;\n position: relative;\n z-index: 1;\n}\n\n.hero-title {\n font-size: 3.5rem;\n font-weight: 700;\n margin-bottom: 1rem;\n line-height: 1.2;\n}\n\n.highlight {\n background: var(--gradient-1);\n -webkit-background-clip: text;\n -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;\n background-clip: text;\n}\n\n.hero-subtitle {\n font-size: 1.5rem;\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n margin-bottom: 1rem;\n}\n\n.hero-description {\n font-size: 1.1rem;\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n margin-bottom: 2rem;\n line-height: 1.8;\n}\n\n.hero-buttons {\n display: flex;\n gap: 1rem;\n margin-bottom: 2rem;\n}\n\n.btn {\n padding: 0.875rem 2rem;\n border-radius: 0.5rem;\n text-decoration: none;\n font-weight: 600;\n transition: all 0.3s ease;\n display: inline-block;\n cursor: pointer;\n border: none;\n font-size: 1rem;\n}\n\n.btn-primary {\n background: var(--gradient-1);\n color: white;\n box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3);\n}\n\n.btn-primary:hover {\n transform: translateY(-2px);\n box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.4);\n}\n\n.btn-outline {\n background: transparent;\n color: var(--text-primary);\n border: 2px solid var(--primary-color);\n}\n\n.btn-outline:hover {\n background: var(--primary-color);\n transform: translateY(-2px);\n}\n\n.social-links {\n display: flex;\n gap: 1rem;\n}\n\n.social-links a {\n width: 45px;\n height: 45px;\n display: flex;\n align-items: center;\n justify-content: center;\n background: var(--light-bg);\n border-radius: 50%;\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n font-size: 1.2rem;\n transition: all 0.3s ease;\n border: 1px solid var(--border-color);\n}\n\n.social-links a:hover {\n background: var(--gradient-1);\n color: white;\n transform: translateY(-3px);\n box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3);\n}\n\n.hero-image {\n display: flex;\n justify-content: center;\n}\n\n.image-placeholder {\n width: 350px;\n height: 350px;\n background: var(--gradient-1);\n border-radius: 50%;\n display: flex;\n align-items: center;\n justify-content: center;\n font-size: 15rem;\n color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);\n box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.4);\n animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;\n}\n\n@keyframes float {\n 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0px); }\n 50% { transform: translateY(-20px); }\n}\n\n.scroll-indicator {\n position: absolute;\n bottom: 2rem;\n left: 50%;\n transform: translateX(-50%);\n animation: bounce 2s infinite;\n}\n\n.scroll-indicator a {\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n font-size: 2rem;\n text-decoration: none;\n}\n\n@keyframes bounce {\n 0%, 20%, 50%, 80%, 100% { transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(0); }\n 40% { transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-10px); }\n 60% { transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-5px); }\n}\n\n/* Section Styles */\nsection {\n padding: 6rem 0;\n}\n\n.section-title {\n font-size: 2.5rem;\n font-weight: 700;\n text-align: center;\n margin-bottom: 1rem;\n position: relative;\n}\n\n.section-title::after {\n content: '';\n position: absolute;\n bottom: -10px;\n left: 50%;\n transform: translateX(-50%);\n width: 80px;\n height: 4px;\n background: var(--gradient-1);\n border-radius: 2px;\n}\n\n.section-subtitle {\n text-align: center;\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n font-size: 1.1rem;\n margin-bottom: 3rem;\n}\n\n/* About Section */\n.about {\n background: var(--darker-bg);\n}\n\n.about-content {\n display: grid;\n grid-template-columns: 1fr 1.5fr;\n gap: 4rem;\n align-items: center;\n margin-top: 3rem;\n}\n\n.about-image .image-frame {\n width: 300px;\n height: 300px;\n background: var(--light-bg);\n border-radius: 20px;\n display: flex;\n align-items: center;\n justify-content: center;\n font-size: 10rem;\n color: var(--primary-color);\n border: 3px solid var(--border-color);\n box-shadow: var(--card-shadow);\n}\n\n.about-text h3 {\n font-size: 1.8rem;\n margin-bottom: 1rem;\n color: var(--text-primary);\n}\n\n.about-text p {\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n margin-bottom: 1rem;\n line-height: 1.8;\n}\n\n.about-stats {\n display: grid;\n grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);\n gap: 2rem;\n margin-top: 2rem;\n}\n\n.stat {\n text-align: center;\n padding: 1.5rem;\n background: var(--light-bg);\n border-radius: 10px;\n border: 1px solid var(--border-color);\n}\n\n.stat h4 {\n font-size: 2rem;\n background: var(--gradient-1);\n -webkit-background-clip: text;\n -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;\n background-clip: text;\n margin-bottom: 0.5rem;\n}\n\n.stat p {\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n font-size: 0.9rem;\n}\n\n/* Skills Section */\n.skills-grid {\n display: grid;\n grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));\n gap: 2rem;\n margin-top: 3rem;\n}\n\n.skill-card {\n background: var(--light-bg);\n padding: 2rem;\n border-radius: 15px;\n border: 1px solid var(--border-color);\n transition: all 0.3s ease;\n box-shadow: var(--card-shadow);\n}\n\n.skill-card:hover {\n transform: translateY(-5px);\n box-shadow: var(--card-shadow-hover);\n border-color: var(--primary-color);\n}\n\n.skill-icon {\n width: 70px;\n height: 70px;\n background: var(--gradient-1);\n border-radius: 15px;\n display: flex;\n align-items: center;\n justify-content: center;\n font-size: 2rem;\n color: white;\n margin-bottom: 1.5rem;\n}\n\n.skill-card h3 {\n font-size: 1.5rem;\n margin-bottom: 1rem;\n}\n\n.skill-card ul {\n list-style: none;\n}\n\n.skill-card li {\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n padding: 0.5rem 0;\n padding-left: 1.5rem;\n position: relative;\n}\n\n.skill-card li::before {\n content: '';\n position: absolute;\n left: 0;\n color: var(--primary-color);\n font-size: 1.2rem;\n}\n\n/* Projects Section */\n.projects {\n background: var(--darker-bg);\n}\n\n.projects-grid {\n display: grid;\n grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(350px, 1fr));\n gap: 2rem;\n margin-top: 3rem;\n}\n\n.project-card {\n background: var(--light-bg);\n border-radius: 15px;\n overflow: hidden;\n border: 1px solid var(--border-color);\n transition: all 0.3s ease;\n box-shadow: var(--card-shadow);\n}\n\n.project-card:hover {\n transform: translateY(-5px);\n box-shadow: var(--card-shadow-hover);\n}\n\n.project-image {\n position: relative;\n height: 200px;\n overflow: hidden;\n background: var(--dark-bg);\n}\n\n.project-placeholder {\n width: 100%;\n height: 100%;\n display: flex;\n align-items: center;\n justify-content: center;\n font-size: 4rem;\n color: var(--primary-color);\n background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--dark-bg) 0%, var(--light-bg) 100%);\n}\n\n.project-overlay {\n position: absolute;\n top: 0;\n left: 0;\n right: 0;\n bottom: 0;\n background: rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.9);\n display: flex;\n align-items: center;\n justify-content: center;\n gap: 1rem;\n opacity: 0;\n transition: opacity 0.3s ease;\n}\n\n.project-card:hover .project-overlay {\n opacity: 1;\n}\n\n.project-link {\n width: 50px;\n height: 50px;\n background: white;\n border-radius: 50%;\n display: flex;\n align-items: center;\n justify-content: center;\n color: var(--primary-color);\n font-size: 1.2rem;\n transition: all 0.3s ease;\n text-decoration: none;\n}\n\n.project-link:hover {\n transform: scale(1.1);\n}\n\n.project-info {\n padding: 1.5rem;\n}\n\n.project-info h3 {\n font-size: 1.3rem;\n margin-bottom: 0.5rem;\n}\n\n.project-info p {\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n font-size: 0.95rem;\n line-height: 1.6;\n margin-bottom: 1rem;\n}\n\n.project-tags {\n display: flex;\n flex-wrap: wrap;\n gap: 0.5rem;\n}\n\n.tag {\n padding: 0.3rem 0.8rem;\n background: var(--dark-bg);\n border: 1px solid var(--border-color);\n border-radius: 20px;\n font-size: 0.85rem;\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n}\n\n/* Contact Section */\n.contact-content {\n display: grid;\n grid-template-columns: 1fr 1.5fr;\n gap: 3rem;\n margin-top: 3rem;\n}\n\n.contact-info {\n display: flex;\n flex-direction: column;\n gap: 2rem;\n}\n\n.contact-item {\n display: flex;\n align-items: center;\n gap: 1.5rem;\n padding: 1.5rem;\n background: var(--light-bg);\n border-radius: 10px;\n border: 1px solid var(--border-color);\n transition: all 0.3s ease;\n}\n\n.contact-item:hover {\n transform: translateX(5px);\n border-color: var(--primary-color);\n}\n\n.contact-icon {\n width: 60px;\n height: 60px;\n background: var(--gradient-1);\n border-radius: 10px;\n display: flex;\n align-items: center;\n justify-content: center;\n font-size: 1.5rem;\n color: white;\n flex-shrink: 0;\n}\n\n.contact-item h4 {\n font-size: 1.1rem;\n margin-bottom: 0.3rem;\n}\n\n.contact-item p {\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n font-size: 0.95rem;\n}\n\n.contact-form {\n background: var(--light-bg);\n padding: 2rem;\n border-radius: 15px;\n border: 1px solid var(--border-color);\n}\n\n.form-group {\n margin-bottom: 1.5rem;\n}\n\n.form-group input,\n.form-group textarea {\n width: 100%;\n padding: 1rem;\n background: var(--dark-bg);\n border: 1px solid var(--border-color);\n border-radius: 8px;\n color: var(--text-primary);\n font-size: 1rem;\n font-family: inherit;\n transition: all 0.3s ease;\n}\n\n.form-group input:focus,\n.form-group textarea:focus {\n outline: none;\n border-color: var(--primary-color);\n box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1);\n}\n\n.form-group textarea {\n resize: vertical;\n min-height: 150px;\n}\n\n/* Footer */\n.footer {\n background: var(--darker-bg);\n padding: 2rem 0;\n border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color);\n}\n\n.footer-content {\n display: flex;\n justify-content: space-between;\n align-items: center;\n}\n\n.footer-content p {\n color: var(--text-secondary);\n}\n\n.footer-links {\n document.getElementById('navToggle');\nconst navMenu = document.getElementById('navMenu');\nconst navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');\n\nnavToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {\n navMenu.classList.toggle('active');\n \n // Animate hamburger menu\n const spans = navToggle.querySelectorAll('span');\n if (navMenu.classList.contains('active')) {\n spans[0].style.transform = 'rotate(45deg) translate(5px, 5px)';\n spans[1].style.opacity = '0';\n spans[2].style.transform = 'rotate(-45deg) translate(7px, -6px)';\n } else {\n spans[0].style.transform = 'none';\n spans[1].style.opacity = '1';\n spans[2].style.transform = 'none';\n }\n});\n\n// Close mobile menu when a link is clicked\nnavLinks.forEach(link => {\n link.addEventListener('click', () => {\n navMenu.classList.remove('active');\n const spans = navToggle.querySelectorAll('span');\n spans[0].style.transform = 'none';\n spans[1].style.opacity = '1';\n spans[2].style.transform = 'none';\n });\n});\n\n// Smooth scroll for navigation links\ndocument.querySelectorAll('a[href^=\"#\"]').forEach(anchor => {\n anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {\n e.preventDefault();\n const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));\n if (target) {\n target.scrollIntoView({\n behavior: 'smooth',\n block: 'start'\n });\n }\n });\n});\n\n// Navbar scroll effect\nconst navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar');\nlet lastScroll = 0;\n\nwindow.addEventListener('scroll', () => {\n const currentScroll = window.pageYOffset;\n \n if (currentScroll <= 0) {\n navbar.style.boxShadow = 'none';\n } else {\n navbar.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)';\n }\n \n lastScroll = currentScroll;\n});\n\n// Active navigation link on scroll\nconst sections = document.querySelectorAll('section[id]');\n\nfunction highlightNavigation() {\n const scrollY = window.pageYOffset;\n\n sections.forEach(current => {\n const sectionHeight = current.offsetHeight;\n const sectionTop = current.offsetTop - 100;\n const sectionId = current.getAttribute('id');\n \n if (scrollY > sectionTop && scrollY <= sectionTop + sectionHeight) {\n document.querySelector('.nav-link[href*=' + sectionId + ']')?.classList.add('active');\n } else {\n document.querySelector('.nav-link[href*=' + sectionId + ']')?.classList.remove('active');\n }\n });\n}\n\nwindow.addEventListener('scroll', highlightNavigation);\n\n// Add active class style\nconst style = document.createElement('style');\nstyle.textContent = `\n .nav-link.active {\n color: var(--text-primary);\n }\n .nav-link.active::after {\n width: 100%;\n }\n`;\ndocument.head.appendChild(style);\n\n// Contact Form Handling\nconst contactForm = document.getElementById('contactForm');\n\ncontactForm.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {\n e.preventDefault();\n \n const name = document.getElementById('name').value;\n const email = document.getElementById('email').value;\n const subject = document.getElementById('subject').value;\n const message = document.getElementById('message').value;\n \n // Here you would typically send the form data to a server\n // For now, we'll just show an alert\n \n // Create a success message\n const successMessage = document.createElement('div');\n successMessage.style.cssText = `\n position: fixed;\n top: 100px;\n right: 20px;\n background: linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981 0%, #059669 100%);\n color: white;\n padding: 1rem 2rem;\n border-radius: 10px;\n box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.3);\n z-index: 10000;\n animation: slideIn 0.3s ease;\n `;\n successMessage.innerHTML = `\n
\n \n
\n Message Sent!\n

I'll get back to you soon.

\n
\n
\n `;\n \n // Add animation\n const styleSheet = document.createElement('style');\n styleSheet.textContent = `\n @keyframes slideIn {\n from {\n transform: translateX(400px);\n opacity: 0;\n }\n to {\n transform: translateX(0);\n opacity: 1;\n }\n }\n @keyframes slideOut {\n from {\n transform: translateX(0);\n opacity: 1;\n }\n to {\n transform: translateX(400px);\n opacity: 0;\n }\n }\n `;\n document.head.appendChild(styleSheet);\n \n document.body.appendChild(successMessage);\n \n // Remove message after 4 seconds\n setTimeout(() => {\n successMessage.style.animation = 'slideOut 0.3s ease';\n setTimeout(() => {\n document.body.removeChild(successMessage);\n }, 300);\n }, 4000);\n \n // Reset form\n contactForm.reset();\n \n // Log form data (in production, send to server)\n console.log('Form submitted:', { name, email, subject, message });\n});\n\n// Intersection Observer for animations\nconst observerOptions = {\n threshold: 0.1,\n rootMargin: '0px 0px -100px 0px'\n};\n\nconst observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {\n entries.forEach(entry => {\n if (entry.isIntersecting) {\n entry.target.style.animation = 'fadeInUp 0.6s ease forwards';\n observer.unobserve(entry.target);\n }\n });\n}, observerOptions);\n\n// Add fade in animation\nconst fadeInStyle = document.createElement('style');\nfadeInStyle.textContent = `\n @keyframes fadeInUp {\n from {\n opacity: 0;\n transform: translateY(30px);\n }\n to {\n opacity: 1;\n transform: translateY(0);\n }\n }\n \n .skill-card,\n .project-card,\n .contact-item {\n opacity: 0;\n }\n`;\ndocument.head.appendChild(fadeInStyle);\n\n// Observe elements\ndocument.querySelectorAll('.skill-card, .project-card, .contact-item').forEach(el => {\n observer.observe(el);\n});\n\n// Typing effect for hero section\nconst heroTitle = document.querySelector('.hero-title');\nif (heroTitle) {\n const text = heroTitle.innerHTML;\n heroTitle.innerHTML = '';\n let i = 0;\n \n function typeWriter() {\n if (i < text.length) {\n heroTitle.innerHTML += text.charAt(i);\n i++;\n setTimeout(typeWriter, 50);\n }\n }\n \n // Start typing effect after a short delay\n setTimeout(typeWriter, 500);\n}\n\n// Add cursor blink effect to typing\nconst cursorStyle = document.createElement('style');\ncursorStyle.textContent = `\n .hero-title::after {\n content: '|';\n animation: blink 0.7s infinite;\n margin-left: 2px;\n }\n \n @keyframes blink {\n 0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }\n 50% { opacity: 0; }\n }\n`;\ndocument.head.appendChild(cursorStyle);\n\n// Remove cursor after typing is complete\nsetTimeout(() => {\n const style = document.createElement('style');\n style.textContent = '.hero-title::after { content: \"\"; }';\n document.head.appendChild(style);\n}, text.length * 50 + 1000);\n\n// Parallax effect for hero section\nwindow.addEventListener('scroll', () => {\n const scrolled = window.pageYOffset;\n const hero = document.querySelector('.hero');\n if (hero) {\n hero.style.transform = `translateY(${scrolled * 0.5}px)`;\n }\n});\n\n// Add smooth reveal animation to sections\nconst revealSections = document.querySelectorAll('section');\nconst revealObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {\n entries.forEach(entry => {\n if (entry.isIntersecting) {\n entry.target.style.opacity = '1';\n entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';\n }\n });\n}, { threshold: 0.1 });\n\nrevealSections.forEach(section => {\n section.style.opacity = '0';\n section.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';\n section.style.transition = 'opacity 0.6s ease, transform 0.6s ease';\n revealObserver.observe(section);\n});\n\n// Project card tilt effect\ndocument.querySelectorAll('.project-card').forEach(card => {\n card.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {\n const rect = card.getBoundingClientRect();\n const x = e.clientX - rect.left;\n const y = e.clientY - rect.top;\n \n const centerX = rect.width / 2;\n const centerY = rect.height / 2;\n \n const rotateX = (y - centerY) / 10;\n const rotateY = (centerX - x) / 10;\n \n card.style.transform = `perspective(1000px) rotateX(${rotateX}deg) rotateY(${rotateY}deg) translateY(-5px)`;\n });\n \n card.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {\n card.style.transform = 'perspective(1000px) rotateX(0) rotateY(0)';\n });\n});\n\nconsole.log('Portfolio loaded successfully! ');\n"}"}},{"id":"toolu_01TmSniL6vrwgyDTkyW7PXMg","type":"function","function":{"name":"write","arguments":"{"file_path": "README.md", "contents": "# Professional Portfolio Website\n\nA modern, responsive portfolio website perfect for developers and designers. This portfolio features a beautiful dark theme, smooth animations, and an intuitive user interface.\n\n## Features\n\n- **Modern Design**: Clean, professional design with gradient accents\n- **Fully Responsive**: Works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices\n- **Smooth Animations**: Engaging scroll animations and hover effects\n- **Dark Theme**: Easy on the eyes with a stunning dark color scheme\n- **Performance Optimized**: Fast loading and smooth interactions\n- **Professional Sections**: \n - Hero/Landing section with introduction\n - About section with stats\n - Skills & Technologies showcase\n - Projects/Portfolio gallery\n - Contact form\n\n## Sections Overview\n\n### 1. **Home/Hero Section**\n- Eye-catching introduction with animated text\n- Call-to-action buttons\n- Social media links (GitHub, LinkedIn, Twitter, Email)\n- Smooth scroll indicator\n\n### 2. **About Section**\n- Professional introduction\n- Experience statistics\n- Personal story and background\n\n### 3. **Skills Section**\n- Categorized skill cards:\n - Frontend Technologies\n - Backend Technologies\n - Database Systems\n - Tools & DevOps\n\n### 4. **Projects Section**\n- Project showcase with 6 sample projects\n- Hover effects revealing project links\n- Technology tags for each project\n- Links to live demo and GitHub repository\n\n### 5. **Contact Section**\n- Contact information (Email, Phone, Location)\n- Functional contact form with validation\n- Success message on form submission\n\n## Customization Guide\n\n### 1. Personal Information\nEdit `index.html` and update the following:\n\n```html\n\n

Hi, I'm Your Name

\n

Full Stack Developer & Creative Designer

\n\n\nGitHub\nLinkedIn\nEmail\n\n\n

your.email@example.com

\n

+91 98765 43210

\n

Mumbai, India

\n```\n\n### 2. Projects\nUpdate the projects section with your own projects:\n\n```html\n

Your Project Name

\n

Project description

\n
\n Technology 1\n Technology 2\n
\n
\n
\n```\n\n### 3. Skills\nModify the skills in each category to match your expertise:\n\n```html\n

    • \n
  • Your Skill 2
    • \n
  • Your Skill 3
    • \n
\n```\n\n### 4. Color Scheme\nEdit `style.css` to change the color scheme:\n\n```css\n:root {\n --primary-color: #6366f1; /* Change primary color */\n --secondary-color: #8b5cf6; /* Change secondary color */\n --accent-color: #ec4899; /* Change accent color */\n}\n```\n\n### 5. Images\nReplace the icon placeholders with your actual images:\n\n```html\n\n
\n \n
\n\n\n\n```\n\n## Installation & Setup\n\n1. **Clone or Download**\n ```bash\n git clone https://github.com/yourusername/portfolio.git\n cd portfolio\n ```\n\n2. **Open in Browser**\n - Simply open `index.html` in your web browser\n - No build process or dependencies required!\n\n3. **Deploy to GitHub Pages**\n - Create a new repository on GitHub\n - Push your files to the repository\n - Go to Settings > Pages\n - Select main branch and save\n - Your portfolio will be live at `https://yourusername.github.io/repository-name`\n\n## File Structure\n\n```\nportfolio/\n\n index.html # Main HTML file\n style.css # All styling\n script.js # JavaScript functionality\n README.md # This file\n```\n\n## Technologies Used\n\n- **HTML5**: Semantic markup\n- **CSS3**: Modern styling with CSS Grid and Flexbox\n- **JavaScript**: Interactive features and animations\n- **Font Awesome**: Icons (via CDN)\n\n## Browser Support\n\n- Chrome (latest)\n- Firefox (latest)\n- Safari (latest)\n- Edge (latest)\n- Opera (latest)\n\n## Performance\n\n- Fast loading time\n- Optimized animations\n- Lazy loading ready\n- Mobile-first approach\n\n## Contact Form\n\nThe contact form currently shows a success message on submission. To make it functional:\n\n1. **Using a Backend Service**:\n - [FormSpree](https://formspree.io/)\n - [EmailJS](https://www.emailjs.com/)\n - [Netlify Forms](https://www.netlify.com/products/forms/)\n\n2. **Example with FormSpree**:\n ```html\n
\n \n

Your site will be live instantly with a custom URL\n\n### Vercel\n1. Install Vercel CLI: `npm i -g vercel`\n2. Run `vercel` in your project directory\n3. Follow the prompts\n\n## SEO Optimization\n\nUpdate meta tags in `index.html`:\n\n```html\n\n\n\n```\n\n## Future Enhancements\n\n- [ ] Add a blog section\n- [ ] Implement theme switcher (dark/light mode)\n- [ ] Add more project details with modals\n- [ ] Include testimonials section\n- [ ] Add resume/CV download option\n- [ ] Integrate real-time contact form with backend\n\n## License\n\nThis project is open source and available under the [MIT License](LICENSE).\n\n## Support\n\nIf you have any questions or need help customizing your portfolio, feel free to reach out!\n\n## Credits\n\nCreated with by [Your Name]\n\n---\n\n**Happy Coding! **\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"toolu_01YRc9tBketxajUfwj5kZm47","content":"Wrote contents to D:/portfolio/index.html. "}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":" Below are some potentially helpful/relevant pieces of information for figuring out to respond ```markdown:README.md, lines=ALL(1-254) # Professional Portfolio Website A modern, responsive portfolio website perfect for developers and designers. This portfolio features a beautiful dark theme, smooth animations, and an intuitive user interface. ## Features - **Modern Design**: Clean, professional design with gradient accents - **Fully Responsive**: Works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices - **Smooth Animations**: Engaging scroll animations and hover effects - **Dark Theme**: Easy on the eyes with a stunning dark color scheme - **Performance Optimized**: Fast loading and smooth interactions - **Professional Sections**: - Hero/Landing section with introduction - About section with stats - Skills & Technologies showcase - Projects/Portfolio gallery - Contact form ## Sections Overview ### 1. **Home/Hero Section** - Eye-catching introduction with animated text - Call-to-action buttons - Social media links (GitHub, LinkedIn, Twitter, Email) - Smooth scroll indicator ### 2. **About Section** - Professional introduction - Experience statistics - Personal story and background ### 3. **Skills Section** - Categorized skill cards: - Frontend Technologies - Backend Technologies - Database Systems - Tools & DevOps ### 4. **Projects Section** - Project showcase with 6 sample projects - Hover effects revealing project links - Technology tags for each project - Links to live demo and GitHub repository ### 5. **Contact Section** - Contact information (Email, Phone, Location) - Functional contact form with validation - Success message on form submission ## Customization Guide ### 1. Personal Information Edit `index.html` and update the following: ```html

    Hi, I'm Your Name

    Full Stack Developer & Creative Designer

    GitHub LinkedIn Email

    your.email@example.com

    +91 98765 43210

    Mumbai, India

    ``` ### 2. Projects Update the projects section with your own projects: ```html

    Your Project Name

    Project description

    Technology 1 Technology 2
    ``` ### 3. Skills Modify the skills in each category to match your expertise: ```html
    • Your Skill 1
    • Your Skill 2
    • Your Skill 3
    ``` ### 4. Color Scheme Edit `style.css` to change the color scheme: ```css :root { --primary-color: #6366f1; /* Change primary color */ --secondary-color: #8b5cf6; /* Change secondary color */ --accent-color: #ec4899; /* Change accent color */ } ``` ### 5. Images Replace the icon placeholders with your actual images: ```html
    ``` ## Installation & Setup 1. **Clone or Download** ```bash git clone https://github.com/yourusername/portfolio.git cd portfolio ``` 2. **Open in Browser** - Simply open `index.html` in your web browser - No build process or dependencies required! 3. **Deploy to GitHub Pages** - Create a new repository on GitHub - Push your files to the repository - Go to Settings > Pages - Select main branch and save - Your portfolio will be live at `https://yourusername.github.io/repository-name` ## File Structure ``` portfolio/ index.html # Main HTML file style.css # All styling script.js # JavaScript functionality README.md # This file ``` ## Technologies Used - **HTML5**: Semantic markup - **CSS3**: Modern styling with CSS Grid and Flexbox - **JavaScript**: Interactive features and animations - **Font Awesome**: Icons (via CDN) ## Browser Support - Chrome (latest) - Firefox (latest) - Safari (latest) - Edge (latest) - Opera (latest) ## Performance - Fast loading time - Optimized animations - Lazy loading ready - Mobile-first approach ## Contact Form The contact form currently shows a success message on submission. if (navMenu.classList.contains('active')) { spans[0].style.transform = 'rotate(45deg) translate(5px, 5px)'; spans[1].style.opacity = '0'; spans[2].style.transform = 'rotate(-45deg) translate(7px, -6px)'; } else { spans[0].style.transform = 'none'; spans[1].style.opacity = '1'; spans[2].style.transform = 'none'; } }); // Close mobile menu when a link is clicked navLinks.forEach(link => { link.addEventListener('click', () => { navMenu.classList.remove('active'); const spans = navToggle.querySelectorAll('span'); spans[0].style.transform = 'none'; spans[1].style.opacity = '1'; spans[2].style.transform = 'none'; }); }); // Smooth scroll for navigation links document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => { anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) { e.preventDefault(); const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')); if (target) { target.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' }); } }); }); // Navbar scroll effect const navbar = document.querySelector('.navbar'); let lastScroll = 0; window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { const currentScroll = window.pageYOffset; if (currentScroll <= 0) { navbar.style.boxShadow = 'none'; } else { navbar.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)'; } lastScroll = currentScroll; }); // Active navigation link on scroll const sections = document.querySelectorAll('section[id]'); function highlightNavigation() { const scrollY = window.pageYOffset; sections.forEach(current => { const sectionHeight = current.offsetHeight; const sectionTop = current.offsetTop - 100; const sectionId = current.getAttribute('id'); if (scrollY > sectionTop && scrollY <= sectionTop + sectionHeight) { document.querySelector('.nav-link[href*=' + sectionId + ']')?.classList.add('active'); } else { document.querySelector('.nav-link[href*=' + sectionId + ']')?.classList.remove('active'); } }); } window.addEventListener('scroll', highlightNavigation); // Add active class style const style = document.createElement('style'); style.textContent = ` .nav-link.active { color: var(--text-primary); } .nav-link.active::after { width: 100%; } `; document.head.appendChild(style); // Contact Form Handling const contactForm = document.getElementById('contactForm'); contactForm.addEventListener('submit', (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const name = document.getElementById('name').value; const email = document.getElementById('email').value; const subject = document.getElementById('subject').value; const message = document.getElementById('message').value; // Here you would typically send the form data to a server // For now, we'll just show an alert // Create a success message const successMessage = document.createElement('div'); successMessage.style.cssText = ` position: fixed; top: 100px; right: 20px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981 0%, #059669 100%); color: white; padding: 1rem 2rem; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.3); z-index: 10000; animation: slideIn 0.3s ease; `; successMessage.innerHTML = `
    Message Sent!

    I'll get back to you soon.

    `; // Add animation const styleSheet = document.createElement('style'); styleSheet.textContent = ` @keyframes slideIn { from { transform: translateX(400px); opacity: 0; } to { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } } @keyframes slideOut { from { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } to { transform: translateX(400px); opacity: 0; } } `; document.head.appendChild(styleSheet); document.body.appendChild(successMessage); // Remove message after 4 seconds setTimeout(() => { successMessage.style.animation = 'slideOut 0.3s ease'; setTimeout(() => { document.body.removeChild(successMessage); }, 300); }, 4000); // Reset form contactForm.reset(); // Log form data (in production, send to server) console.log('Form submitted:', { name, email, subject, message }); }); // Intersection Observer for animations const observerOptions = { threshold: 0.1, rootMargin: '0px 0px -100px 0px' }; const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => { entries.forEach(entry => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { entry.target.style.animation = 'fadeInUp 0.6s ease forwards'; observer.unobserve(entry.target); } }); }, observerOptions); // Add fade in animation const fadeInStyle = document.createElement('style'); fadeInStyle.textContent = ` @keyframes fadeInUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(30px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } .skill-card, .project-card, .contact-item { opacity: 0; } `; document.head.appendChild(fadeInStyle); // Observe elements document.querySelectorAll('.skill-card, .project-card, .contact-item').forEach(el => { observer.observe(el); }); // Profile Image Handler document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { const profileImg = document.getElementById('profileImg'); if (profileImg) { // You can replace this URL with your actual image URL // Option 1: Use a local image (place image in same folder) // profileImg.src = 'profile.jpg'; // Option 2: Use image hosting service like Imgur, Cloudinary etc // profileImg.src = 'YOUR_IMAGE_URL_HERE'; // For now, it will show the default icon if no image is found } }); // Typing effect for hero section const heroTitle = document.querySelector('.hero-title'); if (heroTitle) { const text = heroTitle.innerHTML; heroTitle.innerHTML = ''; let i = 0; function typeWriter() { if (i < text.length) { heroTitle.innerHTML += text.charAt(i); i++; setTimeout(typeWriter, 50); } } // Start typing effect after a short delay setTimeout(typeWriter, 500); } // Add cursor blink effect to typing const cursorStyle = document.createElement('style'); cursorStyle.textContent = ` .hero-title::after { content: '|'; animation: blink 0.7s infinite; margin-left: 2px; } @keyframes blink { 0%, 100% { opacity: 1; } 50% { opacity: 0; } } `; document.head.appendChild(cursorStyle); // Remove cursor after typing is complete setTimeout(() => { const style = document.createElement('style'); style.textContent = '.hero-title::after { content: ""; }'; document.head.appendChild(style); }, text.length * 50 + 1000); // Parallax effect for hero section window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { const scrolled = window.pageYOffset; const hero = document.querySelector('.hero'); if (hero) { hero.style.transform = `translateY(${scrolled * 0.5}px)`; } }); // Add smooth reveal animation to sections const revealSections = document.querySelectorAll('section'); const revealObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => { entries.forEach(entry => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { entry.target.style.opacity = '1'; entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(0)'; } }); }, { threshold: 0.1 }); revealSections.forEach(section => { section.style.opacity = '0'; section.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)'; section.style.transition = 'opacity 0.6s ease, transform 0.6s ease'; const x = e.clientX - rect.left; const y = e.clientY - rect.top; const centerX = rect.width / 2; const centerY = rect.height / 2; const rotateX = (y - centerY) / 10; const rotateY = (centerX - x) / 10; card.style.transform = `perspective(1000px) rotateX(${rotateX}deg) rotateY(${rotateY}deg) translateY(-5px)`; }); card.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => { card.style.transform = 'perspective(1000px) rotateX(0) rotateY(0)'; }); }); console.log('Portfolio loaded successfully! ');", "new_string": "// Scroll Progress Bar\nconst scrollProgress = document.getElementById('scrollProgress');\n\nwindow.addEventListener('scroll', () => {\n const windowHeight = document.documentElement.scrollHeight - document.documentElement.clientHeight;\n const scrolled = (window.pageYOffset / windowHeight) * 100;\n scrollProgress.style.width = scrolled + '%';\n});\n\n// Cursor Trail Effect\ndocument.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {\n const trail = document.createElement('div');\n trail.className = 'cursor-trail';\n trail.style.left = e.pageX + 'px';\n trail.style.top = e.pageY + 'px';\n document.body.appendChild(trail);\n \n setTimeout(() => {\n trail.remove();\n }, 600);\n});\n\n// Add cursor trail styles\nconst cursorTrailStyle = document.createElement('style');\ncursorTrailStyle.textContent = `\n .cursor-trail {\n position: absolute;\n width: 10px;\n height: 10px;\n background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(0, 212, 255, 0.8), transparent);\n border-radius: 50%;\n pointer-events: none;\n z-index: 9999;\n animation: trailFade 0.6s ease-out forwards;\n }\n \n @keyframes trailFade {\n to {\n transform: scale(3);\n opacity: 0;\n }\n }\n`;\ndocument.head.appendChild(cursorTrailStyle);\n\n// Enhanced scroll animations with stagger effect\nconst animateOnScroll = document.querySelectorAll('.skill-card, .project-card');\nanimateOnScroll.forEach((el, index) => {\n el.style.animationDelay = `${index * 0.1}s`;\n});\n\n// Typing effect for stats\nconst statNumbers = document.querySelectorAll('.stat h4');\nconst animateStats = (entries, observer) => {\n entries.forEach(entry => {\n if (entry.isIntersecting) {\n const target = entry.target;\n const text = target.textContent;\n const number = parseInt(text);\n \n if (!isNaN(number)) {\n let current = 0;\n const increment = number / 50;\n const timer = setInterval(() => {\n current += increment;\n if (current >= number) {\n target.textContent = text;\n clearInterval(timer);\n } else {\n target.textContent = Math.floor(current) + (text.includes('+') ? '+' : text.includes('%') ? '%' : '');\n }\n }, 30);\n }\n observer.unobserve(target);\n }\n });\n};\n\nconst statsObserver = new IntersectionObserver(animateStats, { threshold: 0.5 });\nstatNumbers.forEach(stat => statsObserver.observe(stat));\n\nconsole.log(' Enhanced Portfolio Loaded Successfully! ');"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"search_replace","tool_call_id":"toolu_01NAXTeJwtSMJW9PXtpWv7uT","content":"The file D:\portfolio\script.js has been updated. {\n entry.target.style.opacity = '1';\n entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';\n }, index * 200);\n timelineObserver.unobserve(entry.target);\n }\n });\n}, { threshold: 0.2 Choose any one:\n\n---\n\n## Method 1: FormSpree (RECOMMENDED - FREE & EASIEST)\n\n### Why FormSpree?\n- **100% Free** for 50 submissions/month\n- No backend coding needed\n- Messages sent directly to your email\n- 2 minutes setup\n\n### Setup Steps:\n\n1. **Go to FormSpree:**\n - Visit: https://formspree.io/\n - Click \"Get Started\" (Free)\n\n2. **Sign Up:**\n - Use your email: `uttam16.kqr@gmail.com`\n - Verify your email\n\n3. **Create New Form:**\n - Click \"New Form\"\n - Name it: \"Portfolio Contact\"\n - Copy your **Form ID** (looks like: `xyzabc123`)\n\n4. **Update index.html:**\n - Open `index.html`\n - Find line 505 (search for \"formspree\")\n - Replace `YOUR_FORM_ID` with your actual Form ID:\n \n ```html\n \n ```\n \n Example:\n ```html\n \n ```\n\n5. **Done!** \n - Test your form\n - Messages will arrive at: uttam16.kqr@gmail.com\n\n---\n\n## Method 2: EmailJS (Advanced Features)\n\n### Setup Steps:\n\n1. **Go to EmailJS:**\n - Visit: https://www.emailjs.com/\n - Sign up for free\n\n2. **Add Email Service:**\n - Connect your Gmail\n - Get Service ID\n\n3. **Create Email Template:**\n - Design your email template\n - Get Template ID\n\n4. **Get Public Key:**\n - Dashboard Account Public Key\n\n5. **Update Your Code:**\n Add this before `` in index.html:\n \n ```html\n \n \n ```\n\n6. **Update script.js:**\n Replace the contact form handler with EmailJS code\n\n---\n\n## Method 3: Google Sheets (Free Alternative)\n\n### Setup Steps:\n\n1. **Create Google Form:**\n - Create form with: Name, Email, Subject, Message\n - Link to Google Sheets\n\n2. **Use SheetDB or similar:**\n - Convert Google Sheet to API\n - Update form action URL\n\n---\n\n## Alternative Contact Methods (Already Working!)\n\nYour portfolio already has these **direct contact methods**:\n\n### 1. **Email Button** \n```html\n\n```\n Opens user's default email client\n\n### 2. **WhatsApp Button**\n```html\n\n```\n Opens WhatsApp chat with you\n\n### 3. **Call Button**\n```html\n\n```\n Directly calls your number (on mobile)\n\n---\n\n## Quick Setup (Under 5 Minutes)\n\n**Choose this for fastest setup:**\n\n1. Follow any method below:\n\n\nMETHOD 1: SAVE AS PDF (EASIEST)\n================================\n\nStep 1: Open Resume\n-------------------\n- Go to portfolio\n- Click \"Download Resume PDF\" button\n- OR click \"View Resume Online\" button\n- Resume opens in new tab\n\nStep 2: Print to PDF\n--------------------\n- Press: Ctrl + P (Windows) or Cmd + P (Mac)\n- Or click the \"Print / Save PDF\" button on resume\n\nStep 3: Save Settings\n---------------------\n Destination: Select \"Save as PDF\"\n Layout: Portrait\n Margins: Default\n Background graphics: ON (IMPORTANT!)\n Headers and footers: OFF\n\nStep 4: Save File\n-----------------\n- Click \"Save\" button\n- Name it: Uttam_Kumar_Resume.pdf\n- Choose location: Desktop or Downloads\n- Done! \n\n\nMETHOD 2: WORD DOCUMENT\n=======================\n\nOption A: Convert PDF to Word\n------------------------------\n1. First, save resume as PDF (use Method 1)\n2. Go to: https://www.ilovepdf.com/pdf_to_word\n3. Upload your PDF\n4. Download Word file\n5. Done! \n\nOption B: Using Microsoft Word\n-------------------------------\n1. Save resume as PDF first\n2. Open Microsoft Word\n3. File Open Select PDF\n4. Word converts automatically\n5. Save as .docx\n6. Done! \n\n\nMETHOD 3: GOOGLE DOCS\n=====================\n\n1. Open resume in browser\n2. Select all (Ctrl + A)\n3. Copy (Ctrl + C)\n4. Open Google Docs (docs.google.com)\n5. Paste (Ctrl + V)\n6. File Download PDF or Word\n7. Done! \n\n\nPRINT SETTINGS (IMPORTANT!)\n===========================\n\nWhen saving as PDF, make sure:\n\n Background graphics: ON\n (This ensures colors appear!)\n\n Destination: Save as PDF\n (NOT \"Microsoft Print to PDF\")\n\n Layout: Portrait\n\n Scale: 100%\n\n Margins: Default\n\n Headers/Footers: OFF\n\n\nTROUBLESHOOTING\n===============\n\nProblem: Colors not showing in PDF\nSolution: Enable \"Background graphics\" in print settings\n\nProblem: Layout broken\nSolution: Use Portrait orientation, 100% scale\n\nProblem: Can't find \"Save as PDF\"\nSolution: Look in Destination dropdown in print dialog\n\nProblem: Want Word format\nSolution: Save as PDF first, then convert using online tool\n\n\nQUICK LINKS\n===========\n\nResume View:\n- Click \"View Resume Online\" in portfolio\n\nPDF Converters:\n- https://www.ilovepdf.com/pdf_to_word\n- https://www.adobe.com/acrobat/online/pdf-to-word.html\n- https://smallpdf.com/pdf-to-word\n\n\nFILE NAMES\n==========\n\nRecommended file names:\n\n Uttam_Kumar_Resume.pdf\n Uttam_Kumar_CV.pdf\n resume.pdf\n\n Avoid: resume1.pdf, new.pdf, document.pdf\n\n\nTIPS\n====\n\n1. Always save as PDF for job applications\n2. PDF maintains formatting across all devices\n3. Name file professionally with your name\n4. Keep file size under 2MB\n5. Use incognito/private mode\n\n\n================================\nLast Updated: January 2025\nStatus: Working & Tested\n================================\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"toolu_01Wh6ZQv2EnoY4hdvEft5N7B","content":"Wrote contents to D:/portfolio/HOW_TO_DOWNLOAD_RESUME.txt. Click \"Commit to main\"\n\n### Step 5: Publish to GitHub\n1. Click \"Publish repository\" button\n2. Uncheck \"Keep this code private\" (make it public)\n3. Click \"Publish Repository\"\n4. Wait for upload to complete \n\n### Step 6: Enable GitHub Pages\n1. Go to: https://github.com/uttamkqr/portfolio\n2. Click \"Settings\" (top right)\n3. Scroll down to \"Pages\" (left sidebar)\n4. Under \"Source\":\n - Branch: **main**\n - Folder: **/ (root)**\n5. Click \"Save\"\n6. Wait 1-2 minutes\n\n### Step 7: Access Your Live Portfolio\nYour portfolio will be live at:\n```\nhttps://uttamkqr.github.io/portfolio\n```\n\n---\n\n## Method 2: Using Git Commands (Terminal)\n\n### Step 1: Open Terminal/PowerShell\n```bash\ncd D:\\portfolio\n```\n\n### Step 2: Initialize Git\n```bash\ngit init\n```\n\n### Step 3: Add All Files\n```bash\ngit add .\n```\n\n### Step 4: Commit Changes\n```bash\ngit commit -m \"Initial portfolio commit - Professional portfolio with resume\"\n```\n\n### Step 5: Create Repository on GitHub\n1. Go to: https://github.com/new\n2. **Repository name:** `portfolio`\n3. **Description:** Professional Portfolio - Data Science & ML\n4. **Public** (not private)\n5. **Don't** initialize with README (we already have files)\n6. Deploy to GitHub Pages

Choose your preferred method and follow the steps

Method 1: GitHub Desktop Easiest

  1. Download GitHub Desktop
    Visit: desktop.github.com
    Install and sign in with: uttamkqr
  2. Create New Repository
    File New Repository
    Name: portfolio
    Description: Professional Portfolio - Data Science & ML
  3. Copy All Files
    From: D:\portfolio\
    To: Repository folder (GitHub Desktop shows location)
  4. Commit Changes
    Summary: "Initial portfolio commit"
    Click: "Commit to main"
  5. Publish Repository
    Click: "Publish repository"
    Make it PUBLIC
    Click: "Publish"
  6. Enable GitHub Pages
    Go to: Settings Pages
    Source: main / (root)
    Save & Wait 2 minutes

Success!

Your portfolio will be live at:

https://uttamkqr.github.io/portfolio

Method 2: Git Commands Advanced

  1. Open PowerShell/Terminal
    Navigate to portfolio folder:
    cd D:\portfolio
  2. Initialize Git
    git init
  3. Configure Git (First Time Only)
    git config --global user.name "Uttam Kumar"
    git config --global user.email "uttam16.kqr@gmail.com"
  4. Add All Files
    git add .
  5. Commit Changes
    git commit -m "Initial commit: Professional portfolio"
  6. Create Main Branch
    git branch -M main
  7. Add Remote Repository
    git remote add origin https://github.com/uttamkqr/portfolio.git
    Important: Create repository on GitHub first!
    Go to: github.com/new
    Name: portfolio (Public, no README)
  8. Push to GitHub
    git push -u origin main
    If asked for credentials:
    Username: uttamkqr
    Password: Personal Access Token
    (Not your GitHub password!)
  9. Enable Pages
    Repository Settings Pages
    Source: main / (root) Save

Method 3: Upload via GitHub.com Simplest

  1. Create Repository
    Go to: github.com/new
    Name: portfolio
    Make it: Public
    Click: Create repository
  2. Upload Files
    Click: "uploading an existing file"
    Drag & drop all files from D:\portfolio\
    Or click: "choose your files"
  3. Commit Upload
    Message: "Initial portfolio commit"
    Click: "Commit changes"
  4. Enable Pages
    Settings Pages
    Source: main / (root)
    Save
Tip: This method is fastest if you don't want to use Git commands!

Deployment Checklist

Congratulations!

Your portfolio is now live and accessible worldwide!

https://uttamkqr.github.io/portfolio

View on GitHub View Live Portfolio
